title: Interpretation of a dream about killing a dead friend in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams in detail about killing a dead friend. In reality, death is one of the forbidden matters in Islamic law and in a dream, it is one of the disturbing and frightening dreams for the person who sees it, especially if the dead person is dear to the viewer, including his family, relatives, or loved ones, and when he sees him in such a state, he feels anxious. Sadness and fear to achieve this vision, as there are many interpretations and differ according to the condition of the dreamer. And the vision that he saw in a dream, so today we have prepared for you our article to explain in detail the interpretation of a dream about killing a dead friend.Interpretation of a dream about killing a dead friendThe interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream varies, depending on whether the dead person is related to the dreamer or not. Women. If the dreamer finds in a dream that he is killing his friend, for whom God died in reality, and the dreamer sees people crying over him, and this crying is devoid of screaming and lamentation, then this is evidence of the presence of one of the relatives or wailing. The children of the deceased will get married soon, and if the seer is a friend of the deceased, his grandchildren will also be happy about the marriage. People crying over the dead who died again in a dream indicates joy and happiness. Crying portends the coming of relief, God willing, and the end of the problems and crises that the dreamer has suffered. If the fortuneteller falls ill, this is a sign of his recovery, God willing. In the event that we see the deceased dying again and this death is accompanied by screams and lamentations over his death, then this vision is not praiseworthy at all because it indicates the death of a member of that deceased family or one of his relatives or members. . His family, and these can be signs of trouble for the viewer, if they are related. Palms of the feet. If the dreamer kills a dead person in a dream and people do not mourn him and do not prepare a funeral for him or do not carry out the duty of condolences, then this is also a vision that does not bode well at all, as it may be. It indicates the fall of his house, its demolition, or the demolition of part of it, but in the case of burying the dead in a dream without any sign of grief, this vision may indicate restoring what fell from it. The house, and it may indicate that the people of the house left it and lived in another place. If the dead person was killed in a bad way, this is evidence that the place where this happened will cause a fire or a major disaster. Relaxing in his bed or while sitting, this is a sign that the dreamer will gain great status among people. Interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream The interpretation of seeing a murder in a dream varies, whether it is logical or not, and this is due to the psychological state of the viewer and his feelings towards the person who killed him, The instrument used in the killing can lead to different interpretations. The whole dream.Interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin believes that if someone sees in a dream that he is killing another person, this is a sign that the dreamer will be able to get rid of his worries and sorrows and that he will also be able to overcome everything in his case. The problems he faces and he will pass safely, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi: The great translator Al-Nabulsi says that seeing a murder in a dream has many interpretations.

title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing pizza in a dream?

preview.html: Hadot website offers you a complete interpretation of pizza in a dream. Some dreams, that's why we collected them for you. Our subscribers are interested in knowing the complete interpretation of cooking pizza in a dream, as well as the complete interpretation of seeing yourself eating pizza in a dream to watch. Interpretation of dreams and visions. Why dream of eating pizza in a dream filled with an ordinary woman? To dream that you are eating pizza in a bowl is one of the visions that indicate goodness and blessings and an indication of the fulfillment of desires. In addition, the girl who dreamed of pizza, and was a famous person, is witnessing many changes in Her life. When seeing pizza, but its shape is different from the usual, it shows the girl her love for innovation and personality change. Interpretation of a complete pizza in a dream for the general woman. Some scholars stated that this is evidence of the necessity of love and feelings of deprivation for the girl. Why does a girl dream of pizza is a sign that she will soon get a man Good and just, and that their marriage will end successfully, God forbid. See also: Why do you dream that you are eating breakfast in a full dream and its meaning? Pizza in a full dream for a married woman. Seeing pizza for a married woman in a dream shows her great need for love and tenderness and indicates prosperity in money. Seeing a married woman in In a dream, you eat pizza. This vision indicates stability in marital life and a feeling of happiness. A married woman who makes pizza during her sleep testifies to her great ability to overcome all the problems and obstacles she faces. Also, the complete inability to cook pizza in a dream for a married woman is evidence of failure and stumbling in life. Which you live in. See also: Why do you dream of seeing Indian cheese in a dream, complete and its meaning? Why does a pregnant woman dream of pizza? Scientists have said that seeing a pregnant woman dreaming of pizza is a sign of kindness and entering a year full of joy and happiness. Also, a pregnant woman’s dream of eating pizza is good news. And evidence of the safety of her fetus and the ease of birth. Also, seeing and eating pizza completely in a dream for a woman indicates abundance of food, prosperity in life, and stability. Why dream of cooking pizza in a completed dream? Seeing making pizza completely in a dream is one of the visions that indicate to the dreamer that he will put an end to all his problems and fears that He suffers from it in his life. Also, seeing a dream in a complete failure to cook pizza is evidence that the dreamer will face many obstacles in life and life. See also: Why does the dream of kneading dough in a dream end? I dreamed that I ate pizza in a complete dream. To dream that you are eating pizza with your family or Your friends is a sign of people's love and great trust in the dreamer. Seeing him eating pizza in a dream speaks about achieving the goals and desires he dreams about in life. It is also an indication of academic success and getting a job as a dreamer, in addition to a promotion. The dream of eating pizza in a complete dream is one of Visions that show that the dreamer has good and abundant food in his life and testify to current money. See also: Why dream of seeing pancakes in a dream in full If you have a dream and want to interpret it, leave it

title: Interpretation of armpit hair in a dream and removing armpit hair in a dream

preview.html: A dream about armpit hair indicates the fulfillment of ambitions and other interpretations. We will interpret it for a girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man, such as short armpit hair, long shaving, thick or smooth. Armpit hair, or plucking and removing armpit hair with a razor or sweetener, or I dreamed that I was removing armpit hair by Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq, Al-Nabulsi and others in continuation of the topic: Interpretation of armpit hair in a dream Meaning of armpit hair in a dream In the case of circumcision, circumcision is also the case for most people. They cut the mustache and nails and remove what Under the armpit, and many sects do not circumcise and do not consider it ugly, so it was lighter on the scrotum. It was said that shaving the armpit in a dream is a desired appearance, and if he sees that he is plucking from his armpit, that will be better. Long armpit hair is not praise, and it may be from shortening the year. It is also a sign of the fulfillment of a command. Or a goal, whether material or scientific, and I see, and God knows best, that the money you obtain may be subject to suspicion. Anyone who sees long armpit hair shows that you have a long and soft armpit hair. Long and soft armpit hair is interpreted as marriage (because these needs are interpreted as marriage). And a lot of armpit hair It indicates an increase in money, God willing, and this money that you keep, along with the length of your armpit hair, is evidence of the satisfaction of the need and the health and generosity of the religion of its owner. Whoever sees his hair coming out of its place will suffer. It was said: The length of armpit hair, if it exceeds the limit, is interpreted by children, and armpit hair, if it is long, is not good, and the dream is not desirable. Because it is a violation of the Sunnah of the Messenger for it to be long, so there is a deficiency in your religion or a difference. In your commitment to God and His Messenger. Check yourself, put your trust in God, keep your prayers on time, and respect matters of your religion. Removing mustache and armpit hair in a dream is evidence of paying off debts, eliminating worries, and following the Sunnah of the Prophet. Seeing the hair on the lower ribs long and thick and covering the chest, if the vision is correct, indicates worries in Your income, and the vision urges you to seek forgiveness and seek forgiveness. May God grant you relief. Whoever sees that he has shaved his armpit or his pubic hair, this indicates the righteousness of his religion, and it was said: shaving the armpit is what he wants. And if he sees that he is plucking his armpit, that will be better. And whoever sees that his armpit hair is growing, it is disliked in religion. He was seen plucking his pubic hair, then he will be fined or lost in another place. Whoever sees that light has been taken from him, if he is rich, money and power will leave him. If he is poor, then he will be content with himself, and if some of it goes away and others are left, then he will lose some of his blessings and something will be delayed. And it was said: Whoever saw that he shaved If a woman sees his pubic hair with a razor, it is praiseworthy, and if a woman sees it, her husband will reward her. Whoever sees that his armpit hair is long, then perhaps this is evidence of the fulfillment of the need for the words of God Almighty - and tie your hand to your wings and it will come out white without illness - Taha 22. Whoever sees a lot of hair in his armpits could indicate He is a person who strives with his strength to collect money in science, government, trade, etc. Seeing long hair under the armpit means achieving one’s goal and may indicate a generous personality, which indicates the religion and generosity of the owner. If he sees a lot of hair in his armpit, then he is the man who requests to be executed in order to collect money in science. And the state, trade, etc

If he sees a lot of hair in his armpit, then he is the man who requests to be executed in order to collect money in science. And the state, trade, etc

title: What is the interpretation of giving bread in a dream to a married woman according to Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Shaheen?

preview.html: The interpretation of giving bread in a dream to a married woman is a good vision agreed upon by the majority of scholars. They are messages of goodness and blessing that come to the dreamer, but with the lives of different people, the interpretation of visions varies. But it can also convey unpromising messages, and the article provides you with an interpretation of this dream from the Encyclopedia website. Interpretation of giving bread in a dream to a married woman according to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets the vision of bread for a married woman as a vision of kindness, blessing, and good news for her and her family. If a woman dreams that she In the market and buys fresh, warm bread. This is evidence that her house will receive a large sum of money soon. But if she sees that she has a wonderful informant and she sees herself standing around bread everywhere. This is evidence that her life, God willing, will be easy and easy, and her food will be plentiful. And her life will be happy. If a married woman sees that one of her deceased relatives gave her a loaf of bread, this is a sign that she will soon give birth to a new baby. But if a married woman conveys the news to one of her unmarried relatives, this is evidence that that person will marry soon, God willing. He says. Ibn Sirin: A woman who sees in a dream that her house lacks bread and does not know how to act. This is evidence of a lack of blessing. Perhaps she and her family do not pray or read the Qur’an at home, so attention should be paid. Also, the interpretation of giving bread in a dream to a woman married to one of her parents is evidence. As a good daughter, her parents love her and always pray for her. If a woman sees that she is eating bread in a dream and the news tastes delicious, this is a sign of good health. If the woman is really sick, this is evidence of a speedy recovery, but if she is pregnant, this is evidence that she will give birth easily. God willing. I had a strange dream about bread. If a married woman saw that her in-laws or a family member had given her bread that was not fresh, and the soul was afraid to eat it. Then he forced her to eat it and it became a beautiful fresh loaf, and this dream carries a very deep message. Interpretation of giving bread in If a married woman dreams that it is moldy, this is evidence that this person is the one who is causing you problems in your life. If you have problems in your real life, these problems come from this person. If you eat bread from him, this is evidence that the person is always disturbing the peace of your life. And you listen to him closely. As for eating bread, it has become hot news, evidence that things can be reconciled if you manage them yourself. You must think and think about the problems and address them and not rule them out from afar, because that will make them continue and may cause them to ignite. Interpretation Presented Bread in a dream for a married woman according to Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen says if a woman sees in a dream that her husband is cutting bread and giving it to his family. This is evidence that her husband is kind and generous and loves her and his family very much because he is a very practical person with good qualities. His attempt to cut bread before giving is evidence that he is a permissible person. Constant problems and he does not like disputes between his family. White news in a married woman’s dream symbolizes

title: What is the interpretation of prickly pear in a dream?

preview.html: Prickly pear in a dream: The interpretation of prickly pear in a dream varies from one interpreter to another, depending on the type of dreamer, his social status, and the situation in which the fig was found during the dream. Interpretation of seeing prickly pears in a dream. Nabulsi believes that if a man sees prickly pear in a dream, this is a sign and sure evidence of That he will be able to develop and develop his trade on a large scale. Also, you can learn all the interpretations of Nabulsi in multiple visions, so visit the Mokhtilaun website. He will also be able to make a lot of profits from it and he will be able to improve his social level to something better than it is now and it will be Able to buy a house. If you see that there is a large collection of this fruit but it contains many thorns, this indicates that this person has many strong, thick and powerful dispositions. It also suggests that he is a difficult person to deal with and everyone avoids him for fear of him and his harsh actions and words. But when you see this fruit and the thorns that surround it densely, this is indisputable evidence that the city in which you live will spread many temptations and rumors. These rumors are not true and will spread widely among those inside it and this will lead to many problems. Interpretation of the vision of figs by Ibn Shahin believes Ibn Shaheen said that the interpretation of prickly pear in a dream for a man is very different from the interpretation for a woman. And whoever sees that he is the one who removes the outer peel from the fruit, this indicates that this person always works hard at his work. He also seeks to overcome all the problems and obstacles that he faces in life and works to Solve all the problems he faces but finds it difficult to achieve them. But if he sees that he is the one who removes the outer peel from this fruit and then eats it, this indicates that this person will achieve happiness and comfort in the future. He also believes that this person will be able to fix his situation and will get closer to God does good deeds. But when a person sees that he has a large bunch of this fruit after peeling it, the interpretation of that is that this person will be able to get everything he wants. He will get everything he wants after a lot of effort and effort for a long time. What is the interpretation Ibn Sirin’s dream of prickly pear? Ibn Sirin believes that if a person sees a prickly fruit in a dream, this indicates the huge gift that the Lord will give him. It also indicates the luxury of life that will accompany this person throughout his life. He also believes that God will grant him reform in his private life and livelihood. And his trade. But if a person sees that he is eating this fruit, but its thorns cause a wound, then this is evidence that he will have a great treasure. This treasure does not have to be money only, but it will be the child’s livelihood or a new job and will be a reason for him to feel joy and happiness in his life. However, if a married woman sees herself eating some of the fruits of this fruit after peeling them, this indicates that God will give her a lot of happiness and joy. This happiness and joy will return to her and all her family members in the future. But if the woman sees a pregnant woman

He will get everything he wants after a lot of effort and effort for a long time. What is the interpretation Ibn Sirin’s dream of prickly pear? Ibn Sirin believes that if a person sees a prickly fruit in a dream, this indicates the huge gift that the Lord will give him. It also indicates the luxury of life that will accompany this person throughout his life. He also believes that God will grant him reform in his private life and livelihood. And his trade. But if a person sees that he is eating this fruit, but its thorns cause a wound, then this is evidence that he will have a great treasure. This treasure does not have to be money only, but it will be the child’s livelihood or a new job and will be a reason for him to feel joy and happiness in his life. However, if a married woman sees herself eating some of the fruits of this fruit after peeling them, this indicates that God will give her a lot of happiness and joy. This happiness and joy will return to her and all her family members in the future. But if the woman sees a pregnant woman

title: Interpretation of a dream about an ax and hitting an ax in a dream

preview.html: Seeing an ax in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, or a divorced woman, for a man, means that he either hits with an ax and digs with an iron axe, or he goes to Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi. Imam Al-Sadiq and othersIf you see an ax in your dream, it is important to understand what this symbol means. An ax in a dream often gives you insight into your career, relationships, and other aspects of your life. An ax is a tool often used to chop wood or cut heavy objects with sharp force. In history, there were also types of battle axes that were also used as weapons, as the human use of the ax dates back to the Paleolithic era – one of the first tools made by man! Interpretation of an ax in a dream Ax: In his eyes there is help and sustenance, and whoever sees an ax in his hand, So he becomes an agent or confidant. Whoever dreams of seeing an ax indicates that he is a servant or a slave, and the ax in a dream may refer to the sharp sword on the neck of the infidels if the ax is used to cut wood, and the iron ax if a person sees it in the dream, it shows him a very good and beneficial benefit, and it can also Interpretation of it. Whoever sees it in a dream as a sign of honesty, truthfulness, sincerity, uprightness, and strength of religion, the Almighty said: {So He made them a land for themselves in abundance. A dream about an ax often represents chopping or cutting off something in your life. Think about recent events – have you been “cut out” from a relationship or career? Have you cut anything out of your life recently? We often see an ax symbolizing the cutting of all ties and relationships with something or someone. An ax is a symbol of finality: there is no reassembling or repairing what was cut down with an ax. Seeing an ax in a dream means that you will give up an addictive substance such as alcohol or stop problematic behavior such as gambling or overeating. If this is something you have wanted to change for a long time, then The dream means that you are finally ready for it, then an ax may appear in your dream. The ax is a symbol that you are finally cutting this behavior out of your life. An ax in a dream can be a symbol of conflict in your life, whether it is personal conflicts or a conflict with another person, especially if the ax is used as a weapon in the dream or if the type of ax you see is a battle ax If you are chopping wood with an axe, this may mean that you are working on an aspect of your life. If wood is difficult to chop in the dream, this may mean that you are not moving as quickly as you would like. It can be a symbol of disappointment in your personal life. If in the dream you feel calm or relaxed while chopping wood or watching someone chop wood, this could be a desire to live a simpler life or go back to basics. It can also mean that you are seeing success in something you have been working on, whether in your personal or professional life. An old ax in a dream may indicate that you are tired of something in your life. If you are chopping wood, this may symbolize that you will put someone or Something is on the “blacklist” in your life, meaning that you will ignore someone or leave a habit or something like that.Interpretation of slaughter and hitting with an ax in a dream –

title: Interpretation of gold in a dream

preview.html: But what about gold in dreams and what this precious metal means for men and women, and we will discover together from your website gptafser.com/ the complete interpretation of the dream of gold, so follow the lines below with us. Interpretation of seeing gold in a dream for a single girl: Seeing a gold earring in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates Marriage, God willing. As for the gold ring, it indicates that she is preoccupied with some worldly matters. A gift of gold in an unmarried girl’s dream foretells her engagement soon. Losing gold in a dream is a sign that you are missing valuable opportunities. Buying gold in a dream represents a girl’s desire to get married. It was also said that In the process of entering into a profitable project. See also: Interpretation of dreams about finding gold in the sea. Interpretation of seeing gold in a dream for a married woman. Seeing gold in general in a married woman’s dream indicates goodness, abundance of livelihood and prosperity, and God knows best. Wearing gold in a dream is a sign of a woman’s adornment and interest. Also, the golden bicycle in the dream symbolizes the husband, and God knows best. If the dreamer is happy wearing gold in the dream. She is surrounded by the care and love of her husband, who treats her well and gives her money and gifts. Interpretation of seeing gold in a dream for a man and its meaning. Al-Nabulsi says that a little gold in a dream indicates Goodness and justice. Gold also symbolizes the abundance of sustenance and the coming of joy, God willing. And whoever sees gold and does not wear it in a dream, God will ease his worries, ease his affairs, and give him good offspring, God willing. If a person sees in his dream that he is carrying gold, this indicates exhaustion, hardship, and great effort. In obtaining a legitimate lifestyle. Read also: Wearing a gold ring in a dream for a married woman. The meaning of seeing gold in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Wearing a ring, earrings, and a bicycle in a pregnant woman’s dream heralds the birth of a son. Either a necklace or a bracelet is a sign of femininity, and God knows best. If a woman sees that she is wearing A dress inlaid with gold. She is a righteous woman who approaches her Lord through worship and good deeds. Raw gold in a dream is not good and indicates worries and diseases. Losing gold is a loss for money and children, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing gold in a dream for young people and its meaning. Ibn Shaheen says that the gold whose value is known in the dreams of young people It is interpreted as money, livelihood, and a good future, God willing. As for gold whose value and quantity are not known in the dream, there is nothing wrong with seeing it, and expressing its loss, and the loss of wishes, and God knows best. Seeing yourself eating gold means saving money for a time of need. And whoever sees gold in a bag or A pot in a dream, these are good deeds for the dreamer. You may be interested: Interpretation of gold in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing yourself wearing gold in a dream. To see yourself wearing something unknown made of gold in a dream indicates lineage and marriage to evil people, and God knows best. If a man wears a gold bracelet In a dream, he will receive a clean inheritance. Either the golden necklace symbolizes occupying a high position. Seeing him wearing golden armor in a dream means that the dreamer’s life is in danger. Golden shoes are evidence of frequent travels.

I dreamed that I was hugging My grandmother and I cry in a dream. The grandmother's silent cry may express kindness, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees his grandmother's water burning in a dream, it may lead to sadness, and God knows best. When you see a grandmother crying and hugging her in a dream, it may mean that you are taking care of her, and God knows best. Whereas if a married woman sees that she is ruling over her deceased grandmother, this may lead to her need for supplication and charity, and God knows the unseen. When a married man sees the death of his mother-in-law in a dream, he may That would be a sign of order for what he did with his sins, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees a nightingale without a sound in the dream, it may express the happiness that he enjoys, but he does not tell others, and God knows the unseen. While seeing a wavy nightingale may express happiness, and God knows best. He has all the knowledge. Seeing a wave can also indicate good news, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation

title: Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a married woman by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a married woman is one of the most beautiful dreams. Every married woman dreams of building a family, a home and having many children. This is the maternal instinct, so the dream is promising and happy. Others are explained in the article through the interpretations of the majority of scholars. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a married woman: A dream about pregnancy for a married woman has a good meaning for a non-pregnant woman, as it gives her good news about the approaching pregnancy that she has been waiting for for a long time and names him Ahmed, as she put it. God is pleased with her and her new baby, and that she will soon hear happy news. Determining the gender of the baby in a dream is an auspicious dream and an indication of the tremendous good that awaits the dreamer in his next life, especially if he is happy and smiling. Pain indicates the birth of a boy, but if she does not feel pain, this indicates that she has given birth to a girl. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a married woman, according to Ibn Sirin. Our scholar Ibn Sirin believes that the dream of a married woman being pregnant is a promising vision, especially if she already has children, where there is comfort and happiness. The dream indicates love. Kindness and effort to do good to benefit. she has. In the afterlife and its world as well, and we find that the dream seems disturbing if the dreamer goes through a period of loss. The materialist, accompanied by tension and anxiety about the future, also shows in the dream that he has many responsibilities, but he will be able to carry them out to the fullest. If the dreamer desires to have children and sees her pregnancy in a dream, then in the next few days there will be happy news, where pregnancy and stability And you will live in a happy family and achieve everything you want, but you must stay away from sins and work to please God Almighty at all times. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman’s vision expresses that she has overcome all the pains of pregnancy well and has resolved all the harmful differences that occur between her and her husband. Not only this, she is able to reach her dreams where life is full of peace. And kindness. The dream indicates the dreamer’s exit from a problem that almost led her to misfortune, so she should glorify her Lord and work hard to preserve her prayers and memories without any neglect. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a married woman who has children while she is not pregnant. Seeing a dream about a pregnant woman who is married and has children while she is not pregnant means She continues to beg her Lord to achieve what he wants for her, so her Lord announces to her that the Gulf is near and that she will do so. Reaching the life that you want to reach and dream of always reaching, and getting rid of the physical and psychological pain that afflicts her during this period. The vision reflects the distinguished social status and the great improvement in the standard of living, which puts the dreamer in the happiest period in her life, so she must always praise her Lord. If the dreamer enters a new job these days or participates in a competition, she will win a wonderful job or succeed in the competition, which will make her reach the goal she wants and dreams of, especially if she is happy and smiling. If the dreamer feels tired in the dream, this leads her to a period of exhaustion, which It causes her to be exposed to some health crises, however

Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a married woman, according to Ibn Sirin. Our scholar Ibn Sirin believes that the dream of a married woman being pregnant is a promising vision, especially if she already has children, where there is comfort and happiness. The dream indicates love. Kindness and effort to do good to benefit. she has. In the afterlife and its world as well, and we find that the dream seems disturbing if the dreamer goes through a period of loss. The materialist, accompanied by tension and anxiety about the future, also shows in the dream that he has many responsibilities, but he will be able to carry them out to the fullest. If the dreamer desires to have children and sees her pregnancy in a dream, then in the next few days there will be happy news, where pregnancy and stability And you will live in a happy family and achieve everything you want, but you must stay away from sins and work to please God Almighty at all times. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman’s vision expresses that she has overcome all the pains of pregnancy well and has resolved all the harmful differences that occur between her and her husband. Not only this, she is able to reach her dreams where life is full of peace. And kindness. The dream indicates the dreamer’s exit from a problem that almost led her to misfortune, so she should glorify her Lord and work hard to preserve her prayers and memories without any neglect. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a married woman who has children while she is not pregnant. Seeing a dream about a pregnant woman who is married and has children while she is not pregnant means She continues to beg her Lord to achieve what he wants for her, so her Lord announces to her that the Gulf is near and that she will do so. Reaching the life that you want to reach and dream of always reaching, and getting rid of the physical and psychological pain that afflicts her during this period. The vision reflects the distinguished social status and the great improvement in the standard of living, which puts the dreamer in the happiest period in her life, so she must always praise her Lord. If the dreamer enters a new job these days or participates in a competition, she will win a wonderful job or succeed in the competition, which will make her reach the goal she wants and dreams of, especially if she is happy and smiling. If the dreamer feels tired in the dream, this leads her to a period of exhaustion, which It causes her to be exposed to some health crises, however
